thread.title: Bloch
thread.title_full: Canada Aventure Motoneige reviewed by Bloch

author: Bloch
title: Bloch
text:
We had a very good and professionnall guide name Jules .
We had very good time with a very good organization and very nice team of french and belgian tourists
Chalets, pourvoiries, food , landscape, riding in the forest and sometimes on lake likeTaureau .
I l' recommand it . Excellent experience
